AcceptedFactionInvite.description: Fires when a player accepts an invite to a faction.

AcceptedSafehouseInvite.description: Fires when a player accepts an invite to a safehouse.

AcceptedTrade.description: Fires when the other player in the client's current trade accepts or declines the trade.

AddXP.description: Fires when a local character gains xp, unless it is flagged not to.

DoSpecialTooltip.description: Fires when updating the tooltip of an IsoObject with a special tooltip.

EveryHours.description: Fires at the start of every in-game hour.

LevelPerk.description: Fires after a local character gains or loses a perk level.

LoadGridsquare.description: Fires after a new square is loaded.

MngInvReceiveItems.description: Fires when managing a remote player's inventory from the admin menu.

OnAIStateChange.description: Fires when a local character (zombie, player) changes state.

OnAcceptInvite.description: Fires when the client accepts a steam invite to a server. See Steamworks API

onAddForageDefs.description: Fires after the foraging item definitions are created.

OnAddMessage.description: Fires when a message is added to chat.

OnAdminMessage.description: Fires when a ticket is created and the local player is an admin. The co-ordinates are the location of the player creating the ticket.

OnAmbientSound.description: Fires whenever a sound meta event or building alarm is triggered.

OnCGlobalObjectSystemInit.description: Fires when the client GlobalObject system is being initialised.

OnChallengeQuery.description: Fires when the main menu wants to check for challenge maps.

OnCharacterCollide.description: Fires when a non-zombie character collides with another (possibly zombie) character.

OnCharacterDeath.description: Fires when any character dies, including zombies and players regardless of whether they are local.

OnChatWindowInit.description: Fires when the chat window is initialised.

OnClientCommand.description: Fires when a client command sent through sendClientCommand is received by the server.

OnClimateManagerInit.description: Fires when the climate manager is initialised.

OnClimateTickDebug.description: Fires every climate manager tick, but only on the client and only when debug mode is enabled.

OnClothingUpdated.description: Fires every time a character's clothing is updated. This includes when accumulating dirt or blood.

OnConnectFailed.description: Fires when the client fails to connect to a server.

OnConnected.description: Fires after successfully connecting to a server on the main menu, before character creation begins.

OnConnectionStateChanged.description: Fires when the client's connection state is updated while trying to connect to a server.

OnContainerUpdate.description: Fires when a container is added or removed from the world.

OnCoopJoinFailed.description: Fires when a splitscreen character fails to be added.

OnCoopServerMessage.description: Fires when receiving a server message during a co-op (in-game hosted) game.

OnCreateLivingCharacter.description: Fires when an IsoPlayer or IsoSurvivor object is created.

OnCreatePlayer.description: Fires every time a local player loads into the world.

OnCreateSurvivor.description: Fires when an IsoSurvivor object is created.

OnCreateUI.description: Fires when the UI is initialised.

OnCustomUIKey.description: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is released.

OnCustomUIKeyReleased.description: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is released.

OnCustomUIKeyPressed.description: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is pressed.

OnDestroyIsoThumpable.description: Fires when an IsoThumpable object is destroyed by damage.

OnDeviceText.description: Fires whenever a radio displays text.

OnDisconnect.description: Fires when the client disconnects from a server.

onDisableSearchMode.description: Fires when a local player disables search mode.

OnDistributionMerge.description: Fires when the distribution tables merge.

OnDoTileBuilding2.description: Fires when the local mouse and keyboard player builds something.

OnDoTileBuilding3.description: Fires when a controller player builds something.

OnDynamicMovableRecipe.description: Fires when a local character crafts a dynamically generated Moveable scrapping recipe.

onEnableSearchMode.description: Fires when a local player enables search mode.

OnEnterVehicle.description: Fires when a character enters a vehicle.

OnEquipPrimary.description: Fires when a character equips a new item in their primary slot.

OnEquipSecondary.description: Fires when a character equips a new item in their secondary slot.

OnExitVehicle.description: Fires when a character exits a vehicle.

OnFETick.description: Fires every tick while on the main menu.

OnFillContainer.description: Fires whenever a container is first filled with loot, or when loot respawns. Never fires for corpses. For vehicle containers, the roomType is instead the vehicle type.

OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.description: Fires after the context menu for an inventory item is created.

OnFillInventoryContextMenuNoItems.description: Fires after the context menu for an empty inventory is created.

onFillSearchIconContextMenu.description: Fires when opening the context menu for a foraging item.

OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu.description: Fires after the context menu for a world object is created.

OnGameBoot.description: Fires after the game finishes starting up. Note: For clients, lua files in lua/server/ will not have loaded by the time this event is fired. This does not apply to servers.

OnGameStart.description: Fires upon finishing loading and entering the game.

OnGameStateEnter.description: Fires upon entering the Terms Of Service game state.

OnGamepadConnect.description: Fires after a controller is connected.

OnGamepadDisconnect.description: Fires after a controller is disconnected.

OnGetDBSchema.description: Fires when receiving the database schema from the server.

OnGetTableResult.description: Fires when receiving a database table query result from the server.

OnGridBurnt.description: Fires when a square is burned by fire.

OnHitZombie.description: Fires whenever a zombie is hit by a character.

OnInitGlobalModData.description: Fires when GlobalModData is initialised. This is the earliest event after Sandbox Options are loaded.

OnInitModdedWeatherStage.description: Fires when a modded weather period is created.

OnInitSeasons.description: Fires when the ErosionManager is created.

OnInitWorld.description: Fires after the world has initialised.

onItemFall.description: Fires when a local character is forced to drop the items in their hands.

OnJoypadActivate.description: Fires whenever a controller starts being used during gameplay.

OnJoypadActivateUI.description: Fires whenever a controller starts being used outside of gameplay, such as on the main menu.

OnJoypadBeforeDeactivate.description: Fires when a controller is disconnected, before disconnection is processed.

OnJoypadBeforeReactivate.description: Fires when a controller is connected, before connection is processed.

OnJoypadDeactivate.description: Fires after a controller has been disconnected.

OnJoypadReactivate.description: Fires after a controller has been connected.

OnJoypadRenderUI.description: Fires when rendering controller debug UI.

OnKeyKeepPressed.description: Fires every frame while a key is held down.

OnKeyPressed.description: Fires when a key is released.

OnKeyStartPressed.description: Fires when a key starts being pressed.

OnLoad.description: Fires upon finishing loading and entering the game.

OnLoadedMapZones.description: Fires after loading the map zones.

OnLoadedTileDefinitions.description: Fires after loading the tile definitions.

OnLoadMapZones.description: Fires before loading the map zones.

onLoadModDataFromServer.description: Fires when the server sends a square's moddata to the clients, or when the client receives it.

OnLoadRadioScripts.description: Fires after ZomboidRadio loads the radio scripts.

OnLoadSoundBanks.description: Fires after the game loads the FMOD sound banks.

OnMainMenuEnter.description: Fires upon entering the main menu.

OnMechanicActionDone.description: Fires after a character completes a mechanic action on a vehicle.

OnMiniScoreboardUpdate.description: Fires when the admin mini-scoreboard is updated.

OnModsModified.description: Fires on the main menu when a mod's files have changed.

OnMouseDown.description: Fires when the player left clicks, as long as the input isn't eaten by UI.

OnMouseMove.description: Fires every frame, unless mouse movement is eaten by something else. The latter two values are the first two multiplied by the mouse player's zoom level.

OnMouseUp.description: Fires whenever the player releases the left mouse button, unless the input is eaten by UI.

OnMultiTriggerNPCEvent.description: Fires when the player triggers an NPC event.

OnNewFire.description: Fires when a new fire is started.

OnNewGame.description: Fires whenever a local player character is created for the first time.

OnObjectAboutToBeRemoved.description: Fires before a tile object is removed from the world, either because it has been destroyed or because it has been unloaded.

OnObjectAdded.description: Fires when an object is added to the world. Note: usually not called on the client, but is in some cases.

OnObjectCollide.description: Fires when two objects collide with each other.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown.description: Fires when the player left clicks a world object.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp.description: Fires when the player releases left click on a world object.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown.description: Fires when the player right clicks a world object.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp.description: Fires when the player releases right click on a world object.

OnPlayerAttackFinished.description: Fires when a local player finishes attacking.

OnPlayerDeath.description: Fires when a local player dies.

OnPlayerGetDamage.description: Fires every time a local player takes damage. Bleeding bodyparts fire the event once per frame each. Possible damageTypes are: POISON, HUNGRY, SICK, BLEEDING, THIRST, HEAVYLOAD, INFECTION, LOWWEIGHT, FALLDOWN, FIRE, WEAPONHIT, CARHITDAMAGE, CARCRASHDAMAGE It also fires when zombies are hit by weapons: this is the only case in which the event fires on the server.

OnPlayerMove.description: Fires during each local player's update if they are walking.

OnPlayerUpdate.description: Fires during each local player's update (every tick).

OnPostDistributionMerge.description: Fires after the distribution tables have been merged.

OnPostFloorLayerDraw.description: Fires after a floor layer has been rendered.

OnPostMapLoad.description: Fires after the map has been loaded.

OnPostRender.description: Fires after every in-game rendering frame.

OnPostSave.description: Fires after saving and exiting the game.

OnPostUIDraw.description: Fires after every UI render frame

OnPreDistributionMerge.description: Fires after the distribution tables have been merged.

OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.description: Fires while the context menu for an inventory item is being created, before vanilla options are added.

OnPreFillInventoryContextMenuNoItems.description: Fires while the context menu for an empty inventory is being created, before vanilla options are added.

OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu.description: Fires while the context menu for a world object is being created, before vanilla options are added.

OnPreMapLoad.description: Fires before the map starts loading.

OnPressRackButton.description: Fires when a local player has a gun and presses the button to rack it.

OnPressReloadButton.description: Fires when a local player has a gun and presses the button to reload it.

OnPressWalkTo.description: Fires when the local player 1 presses their Walk To keybind. The values passed are always 0,0,0

OnPreUIDraw.description: Fires before every UI render frame

OnReceiveGlobalModData.description: Fires when receiving a global moddata table. The table argument is false if the table did not exist.

OnReceiveItemListNet.description: Fires when receiving a list of items from another player.

OnReceiveUserlog.description: Fires when receiving another client's Userlogs.

OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers.description: Fires when the available containers in the inventory UI change.

OnResetLua.description: Fires after Lua has been reloaded.

OnResolutionChange.description: Fires whenever the window resolution changes.

OnRightMouseDown.description: Fires when the player right clicks, as long as the input isn't eaten by UI.

OnRightMouseUp.description: Fires whenever the player releases the right mouse button, unless the input is eaten by UI.

OnSafehousesChanged.description: Fires every time a safehouse is added, removed or changed.

OnScoreboardUpdate.description: Fires when the client receives an update to the in-game scoreboard.

OnSeeNewRoom.description: Fires when a room becomes visible for the first time.

OnServerCommand.description: Fires when a server command sent through sendServerCommand is received by the client.

OnServerFinishSaving.description: Fires when the server has finished saving and unpauses the game.

OnServerStarted.description: Fires when the server has started and can now be connected to.

OnServerStartSaving.description: Fires when the server has paused the game to save.

OnServerStatisticReceived.description: Fires when the MPStatistics have been received from the server.

OnServerWorkshopItems.description: Fires when receiving an update about the server's Steam Workshop items while connecting.

OnSetDefaultTab.description: Fires when the player sets their favourite chat window tab.

OnSGlobalObjectSystemInit.description: Fires when the server GlobalObject system has been initialised.

OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.description: Fires when the spawn regions have been loaded.

OnSteamFriendStatusChanged.description: Fires when the player has gained or lost a steam friend.

OnSteamGameJoin.description: Fires when the player joins a game through steam.

OnSteamRefreshInternetServers.description: Fires when the steam server list has been refreshed.

OnSteamRulesRefreshComplete.description: Fires after a server's rules are retrieved. 'rules' is a table of information about the server.

OnSteamServerResponded.description: Fires when receiving a server for the server list.

OnSteamServerResponded2.description: Fires when receiving a server for the favourited server list.

OnSteamWorkshopItemCreated.description: Fires when the client successfully uploads a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotCreated.description: Fires when the client fails to upload a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotUpdated.description: Fires when the client fails to update a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemUpdated.description: Fires when the client successfully updates a workshop item.

OnSwitchVehicleSeat.description: Fires when a local character moves seats in a vehicle.

OnTabAdded.description: Fires when a tab is added to the chat.

OnTabRemoved.description: Fires when a tab is removed from the chat.

OnThrowableExplode.description: Fires when a throwable or trap explodes.

OnTickEvenPaused.description: Fires every game tick, even if the game is paused. Tick is 0 while paused.

OnTileRemoved.description: Fires when a tile object is removed.

onToggleSearchMode.description: Fires when a local player toggles search mode.

OnTriggerNPCEvent.description: Fires when the player triggers an NPC event.

onUpdateIcon.description: Fires when an ISForageIcon is moved or removed.

OnUpdateModdedWeatherStage.description: Fires when a modded weather stage tries to be updated.

OnUseVehicle.description: Fires when a local character enters or exits a vehicle.

OnVehicleDamageTexture.description: Fires when a vehicle part has become damaged enough to gain a damage overlay.

OnWaterAmountChange.description: Fires when the amount of water in an object changes.

OnWeaponHitCharacter.description: Fires when a non-zombie character is hit by an attack.

OnWeaponHitThumpable.description: Fires when an IsoThumpable is hit by an attack.

OnWeaponHitTree.description: Fires when a tree is hit by an attack.

OnWeaponHitXp.description: Fires when XP is being granted for an attack.

OnWeaponSwing.description: Fires when a player begins swinging a weapon.

OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.description: Fires when a local player's attack connects.

OnWeatherPeriodComplete.description: Fires when a weather period finishes.

OnWeatherPeriodStage.description: Fires when a weather period progresses a stage.

OnWeatherPeriodStart.description: Fires when a weather period begins.

OnWeatherPeriodStop.description: Fires when a weather period ends early, such as by an admin command.

OnWorldSound.description: Fires whenever a world sound is created.

OnZombieDead.description: Fires when a local zombie dies. The zombie's inventory is not filled with loot when this event fires, but their clothing and attached items are added.

preAddCatDefs.description: Fires before the foraging system processes item category definitions.

preAddForageDefs.description: Fires before the foraging system processes any definitions.

preAddItemDefs.description: Fires before the foraging system processes item definitions.

preAddSkillDefs.description: Fires before the foraging system processes trait and profession definitions.

preAddZoneDefs.description: Fires before the foraging system processes zone definitions.

ReceiveFactionInvite.description: Fires when the client receives a faction invite.

ReceiveSafehouseInvite.description: Fires when the client receives a safehouse invite.

RequestTrade.description: Fires when the client receives a trade request.

ReuseGridsquare.description: Fires before a square is unloaded.

SendCustomModData.description: Fires when a client is requesting server moddata.

ServerPinged.description: Fires when receiving a ping response from the server. The 'numClients' string is suffixed with '/512'.

SwitchChatStream.description: Fires when the client switches chat tabs.

SyncFaction.description: Fires when the client receives changes to a faction.

TradingUIAddItem.description: Fires when the other player in a trade adds an item.

TradingUIRemoveItem.description: Fires when the other player in a trade removes an item.

TradingUIUpdateState.description: Fires when the other player in a trade changes the state of the trade.

ViewTickets.description: Fires when receiving the list of tickets from the server.

Attack.description: Called every tick while a local character is pressing their attack button and is able to attack.

AutoDrink.description: Called whenever a character automatically drinks while auto-drink is turned on.

CalculateStats.description: Called when a character's stats are being updated. Character health is not included.

WeaponHitCharacter.description: Called when the effects of an attack are being calculated.

WeaponSwing.description: Called when a weapon is swung to find targets
